name: 10 Years of Tech - The Evolution
description: Tech has changed a lot over the last ten years, so join me on a tech journey where we analyse the last 10 years of technology.

name: The Robot Takeover
description: Have you heard that robots are going to take over the world? Surely you have. Find out when and where this is gonna happen in this blog post.

name: Are Apple really Tech gurus?
description: Is Apple really all it's claimed to be over the last five years? I'm not so sure, or am I? Find out more inside this post!
